title: TAPEBEAR Blue Masking Tape, Painters Tape, Residue Free Blue Tape, Decorators Artist Tape with Sharp Lines for Painting, Anti-UV, 0.94 inch x 60 Yard (24mm x55m)
features: BLUE MASKING TAPE: It is made of premium adhesive and blue crepe paper, and can be torn easily and comfortably. Blue masking tape for painters is suitable for indoor and outdoor work.

14-DAY CLEAN REMOVAL:Clean removal masking paper tape with an medium adhesive back sticks well to lots of surfaces. Without concern of damaging, peeling, or leaving sticky residues when removing, for up to 14 days after application. It can deliver Sharp Lines and Narrow Edges.

HIGH PERFORMANCE: The Masking Tapes is UV and sunlight resistant ,and can be applied on hot summer days and/or in direct sunlight. It is easy to use, resist slivering, tear by your hand, and writable.

MULTI-SURFACE: Painters Tape great for wall, glass, hardwood floors, glass, paper and so on. Blue masking tape with high performance, it is a good tool for wall painting, decoration, labeling and other purpose. Its surface accepts markers, pens and pencils, label anything quickly.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Each roll is 0.94 inch x 60 Yard，6Rolls/Pack. Blue painter’s tape Ideal for both Home and Automobile Painting.
description: Product Description Previous page The blue masking tape is UV and sunlight resistant and is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Equipped with an anti-bleed feature that helps you achieve sharp, seamless paint jobs.
